data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Antonio Vega Rosas | October 15, 2020 | Knotts Funeral Home
data.text:
Mr. Antonio Vegas Rosas, age 46 of Apex, NC passed on October 15, 2020 at UNC Hospital, Chapel Hill, NC.

Mr. Vegas Rosas is survived by: wife, Linda Sanchez Vega of Apex, NC/Moultrie, Ga, father, Marco Antonio Vega Fragoso of Mexico, mother, Cirila Rosas Sanchez of Mexico, children, Yajaira Vega Chuz of Mexico, Crystal Fernando of Omega, Ga, Lee Howard of Leesburg, Ga, Brandy Howard of Moultrie, Ga, and Amber Mireles of Moultrie, Ga; brothers, Leonardo Vega Rosas of Mexico and one brother who preceded him in death, Raymundo Vega Rosas; sisters, Carmen Vega Rosas of Mexico, ten grandchildren, four great grandchildren, one god child and a host of other relatives and friends.

ATTENTION: Everyone that Enters the Funeral Home and or Attending the Services - MUST WEAR A MASK

Thank you in advance for helping Us protect the families and communities that we serve.

ATENCION: Todos los que entran an la funeraria y asisten a los servicios - DEBEN USAR UNA MASCARA

Gracias de antemano por ayudarnos a proteger a las familias y comunidades a las que servimos.

Professional Services Entrusted to Knotts Funeral Home - Sanford
